channel.title: [667]Adding/Editing drops?
channel.description:
I've been searching around throughout like 5 different files trying to find General Graardor so I could edit his drops and I've had no luck finding his NPC Id.
I've looked at dropEditor.java, NPCDrops.java, and NPC.java and nothing is coming up. Any ideas?
